text: <@U11HH3P7Y>:  How do I restart a Jenkins build? Or who is able restart a build? <https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/job/fabric-verify-x86_64/94/console>

That one failed with `18:15:43 fatal: unable to access '<https://github.com/golang/lint/>': Failed to connect to <http://github.com|github.com> port 443: Connection timed out` but the link works for me
if you have jenkins user credentials  you can re-trigger build from jenkins home page..
I don’t think I have credentials. Should all maintainers have these?
Or if we just have a good way to re-trigger like we did in GitHub
Maybe I don’t want credentials if it means I could accidentally break something :slightly_smiling_face:
I just want to be able to restart a build without having to bother anyone
will let you know the steps to login to jenkins instance..
